thread.title: Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame
thread.title_full: Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame

title: Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame
text: > Entertainment Richards, Fallon to help induct friends into hall of fame FILE - In this July 15, 2015 file photo, Keith Richards of the Rolling Stones seen at the Le Festival d'ete de Quebec in Quebec City, Canada. Richards and late night talk show host Jimmy Fallon will be special guests helping to induct their friends into the Memphis Music Hall of Fame. Richards will induct Elvis Presleyâ€™s guitarist Scotty Moore and Fallon will induct pop star Justin Timberlake during the ceremony on Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (Photo by Barry Brecheisen/Invision/AP, File)
